title: Data Source Manager
subtitle: Choose and manage your data sources for analytics

activeDataSource.label: Active Data Source:
activeDataSource.excelDescription: All analytics, reports, and messaging will use data from your selected Excel file.
activeDataSource.woocommerceDescription: All analytics, reports, and messaging will use data from your WooCommerce store.

noActiveDataSource.title: No Active Data Source
noActiveDataSource.description: Please select a data source below to start analyzing your data. You can choose between uploading an Excel file or connecting your WooCommerce store.

step1.title: Step 1: Upload Excel File
step1.description: Upload your Excel or CSV files to analyze customer and order data
step1.whatFilesInfo: Upload Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV files containing customer data, orders, or products. After uploading, you'll map your columns to our system format.
step1.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your file

step2.title: Step 2: Select Your File
step2.description: Choose which uploaded file to use as your data source
step2.loadingDescription: Please wait while we fetch your uploaded files
step2.noFilesDescription: Upload your first Excel or CSV file using the form above to get started with data analysis.
step2.clickToActivate: Click "Use This File" to activate a file

woocommerce.title: WooCommerce Store
woocommerce.activateWooCommerce: Activate WooCommerce as your data source:
woocommerce.notConnectedDescription: Connect your WooCommerce store to analyze sales, products, and customer data in real-time.

help.title: Need Help?
help.step1: Upload an Excel file OR connect WooCommerce
help.step2: Select which data source to use
help.step3: Start analyzing your data in Analytics pages
help.tipDescription: You can switch between data sources anytime. Only one can be active at a time.

toasts.failedToLoadFilesDesc: Could not retrieve your uploaded files. Please try again.
toasts.invalidFileTypeDesc: Please upload an Excel (.xlsx, .xls) or CSV file.
toasts.fileUploadedSuccessDesc: has been uploaded and is ready to use.
toasts.uploadFailedDesc: There was an error uploading your file. Please try again.
toasts.dataSourceActivatedExcelDesc: Now using "{fileName}" as your active data source. All analytics will use this file.
toasts.dataSourceActivatedWooCommerceDesc: Now using WooCommerce as your active data source. All analytics will use your store data.
toasts.woocommerceNotConnectedDesc: Please connect your WooCommerce store first.
toasts.failedToDeleteFileDesc: There was an error deleting the file. Please try again.
